name: 孫郁琪
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
Weeks 1-3: Choosing a Topic
Weeks 4-6: Purpose of the Study
Weeks 7-12: Conceptual Context (Literature Review)
Weeks 13-14: Research Questions
Weeks 15-17: Methods
Week 18: Proposal Due

schedule:
Unit One: Using research resources
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Library Tour
Week 3 Database I
Week 4 Database II
Unit Two: Searching for target field
Week 5 Internet resources
Week 6 Choosing for desired fields
Week 7 Focusing on one field
Week 8 Locating several areas of interest
Unit Three: Choosing a topic

scorePolicy:

materials:
